title: verify.request
description: Request schema for verifying a commercial payment, invoice, or settlement record against a provider’s canonical view.

x402.description: x402 envelope describing the verify verb and version.

trace.description: Trace envelope for correlating this verify request with logs and receipts.

payload.description: Verification parameters describing what should be verified and under which constraints.

kind.description: What type of object is being verified.

target.description: Primary identifier for the object being verified (e.g., transaction ID, invoice ID, provider reference).

amount.description: Expected amount and asset for this operation.

settlement.description: Expected settlement destination for this operation.

window.description: Optional time window that this verification is expected to fall into.

from.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for the earliest expected time.

to.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for the latest expected time.

strict.description: If true, require the provider’s canonical view to match all supplied fields exactly.

metadata.description: Optional, non-normative metadata useful for providers and SDKs.
